Text: Australian Energy Vince Dzien dobry Many thanks for agreeing to take the remainder of the VaR seminar it is a great help I asked Raymond Yeow of Enron Australia if he would chair day one but he said that you would be a bigger draw and perhaps better placed To this end I am hoping that you would consider chairing day ones plenary session and trading stream You can blame Raymond for recommending you I appreciate that this is asking even more of you than you originally signed up for but you seem to be famous in this small market and it would be great if you could do it I apologise for imposing once again but look forward to hearing back from you when you get a chance As ever let me know if you have any questions Best regards Joel

Re Fwd Australian Energy Vince I am truly grateful That would be excellent Many thanks Joel Original Message From Vince J Kaminski To Cc Vince J Kaminski Date March Subject Re Fwd Australian Energy Joel I shall be glad to take all the remaining sections I have spoken on this subject several times so it will relatively easy to prepare it Vince on PM To cc Subject Fwd Australian Energy ReturnPath Received from rlyydmxaolcom rlyydmailaolcom by airydmailaolcom v with ESMTP Tue Feb Received from srimsbizcom srimsbizcom by rlyydmxaolcom v with ESMTP Tue Feb Received from joel by srimsbizcom with SMTP id KAA for Wed Mar MessageId XSender XMailer QUALCOMM Windows Eudora Light Version Date Wed Mar To From Joel Hanley Subject Re Australian Energy InReplyTo MimeVersion ContentType multipartmixed boundary Dear Vince I am delighted to be working with you at last I can confirm the lessons learned session and I shall leave it up to you to consider the content The session will last one hour including QA The VaR sessions I was hoping you would address are actually part of the post conference seminar and I realise that I did not send you the schedule for that Please accept my apologies I have attached the seminar outline for you information Glenn Labhart of Dynegy will take the first and last sessions Is there any chance you could do the others I realise that this is a lot but it would be great if you could consider it Please let me know when you can Thanks again for agreeing to come all that way I am sure it will be a worthwhile trip Best regards Joel At PM EST you wrote Dear Joel Thanks for the invitation to speak at Australian Energy I shall be glad to attend and speak on the topics you mentioned in your message and in our telephone conversation The first topic will be Learning from US experience Lessons to be learned from the restructuring North American markets the second topic will be ValueatRisk please feel free to make this title more specific I look forward to meeting you in Australia in July Vince PS As of Friday rd March I shall be back in my London office where my email address is and my number is See attached file varsemdoc
